circumstances:
The floatplane named 'Nicolás Suárez' departed Trinidad on a flight to Cobija with an intermediate stop in Guayaramerín. Approaching the destination, it crashed in unknown circumstances in the Mamoré River, near the pontoon. All four occupants were killed. 
Crew:
Cpt Emilio Beltran, pilot, 
L. Veltze, copilot. 
Passengers:
Elias Gorayeb, 
Col Cruz Saldanha.
